page.title: 20THE COBHAM FAMILY IN 1985
page.content: The Cobham title came to the family in 1889,and the present incumbent is John,11th Viscount.His wife,{Penelope, was interviewed by pupils on 9th July. The present-day estate covers about 2000 acres and there are{no plans to {change the Hall}or its grounds in the near future. Lady Cobham has lived at the Hall for 11 years and loves the landscape, but sometimes regrets having to have the Hall open to the public. She said that they have to hold events at the Hall to enable them to{maintain the house. Lady Cobham was non-commital on important local issues, such as the by-pass or leisure provision. She {likes Hagley village}enormously, for its fascinating atmosphere, good shops and convenience. She considers herself very lucky to live in such a beautiful area.
